alert.note: Alert for Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 11:17PM CDT until May 13 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Brownsville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Zapata County in Deep South Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1117 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of San Ygnacio, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... San Ygnacio, Bustamante, Medina, Zapata High School, Las Palmas, Zapata County Airport, Escobas and Zapata--Medina. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
